meanings.definition: A type of sausage, typically made from beef and pork, seasoned with pepper and other spices.
meanings.sent1: I love the spicy flavor of pepperoni on my pizza.
meanings.sent2: The pepperoni on the pizza looked delicious and smelled amazing.
meanings.sent3: The pepperoni sausage rolled away, trying to escape the pizza!
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like the sizzle of pepperoni on a hot pan.
meanings.sent5: The pepperoni's red color stood out against the melted cheese.

meanings.definition: A slice of pepperoni, often used as a topping on pizza.
meanings.sent1: Can I have extra pepperoni on my pizza, please?
meanings.sent2: The pepperoni slice was perfectly placed on each piece of pizza.
meanings.sent3: The pepperoni slices danced on top of the pizza, making it irresistible.
meanings.sent4: His smile was as satisfying as a bite of pepperoni on a cheesy slice.
meanings.sent5: The pepperoni's aroma filled the room, making everyone hungry.
